description: You’d never guess that this bolognese pasta is vegan. It’s rich and bold in flavour and will soon become a family favourite. It’s a great way to pack in the veg.
keywords: Bolognese,Pescatarian,Low saturated fat,Low salt,Seafood free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Spring,Winter,Low sugar,Sesame free,Summer,Halal,High protein,High fibre,Vegetarian,Vegan,Low fat,Dairy free,Peanut free
name: Vegan Lentil Bolognese Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 500g La Molisana Pastificio Extra Di Lusso wholewheat penne rigate No 20
425g Macro Organic lentils, rinsed and drained

recipeInstructions.text: Heat oil in a large, deep frying pan over mediumlow heat. Add onion, garlic, carrot and parsley stalks, then cook, stirring, for 8 minutes or until softened. Add tomatoes, herb mix and 1 cup water, stir well, then cook, uncovered and stirring regularly, for 15 minutes or until slightly thickened.
Meanwhile, cook pasta in a large saucepan of boiling salted water according to packet instructions. Drain, reserving 1/2 cup cooking liquid.
Add lentils to sauce mixture and cook for a further 5 minutes or until sauce has thickened and lentils are heated through. Season.
Add pasta and reserved cooking liquid to pan. Toss for 2 minutes or until well combined and heated through. Divide mixture among bowls and serve sprinkled with parsley leaves
